name: A Murder of Crows (SelfMadeGames)
description:
A Murder of Crows is a 2D platformer inspired by Unfair Mario (2011). The game was developed in 5 days and submitted to a private rapid ideation event, the theme being, 'A Crow Priest' (Dixit Card).

OBJECTIVES

Get the 'Crow Priest' (player) to the end of the map with minimum casualties. Use crows to scout the map and overcome frustrating obstacles.

CONTROLS

  • Use the arrow keys or W, A, S, D to move
  • Press 'E' to release and play as a crow
  • Press 'R' to load the last checkpoint
  • Press 'ESC' to pause the game
  • Press 'spacebar' to jump (hold for longer jumps)
  • MB1 - Interact with buttons
